BoardCustom.description: Represents an instance of a Board.
BoardCustom.title: Board with custom keys

BoardDetailed.description: Represents an instance of a Board.
BoardDetailed.title: Board with detailed keys

BoardSummary.description: Represents an instance of a Board.
BoardSummary.title: Board with summary keys

PartnerCustom.description:
A Pinterest Partner. A partner is an 'upgraded' user that uses Pinterest
    for commercial purposes. The partner model is linked to the user managing
    the partner account and contains additional business-related fields.
PartnerCustom.title: Partner with custom keys

PartnerDetailed.description:
A Pinterest Partner. A partner is an 'upgraded' user that uses Pinterest
    for commercial purposes. The partner model is linked to the user managing
    the partner account and contains additional business-related fields.
PartnerDetailed.title: Partner with detailed keys

PartnerSummary.description:
A Pinterest Partner. A partner is an 'upgraded' user that uses Pinterest
    for commercial purposes. The partner model is linked to the user managing
    the partner account and contains additional business-related fields.
PartnerSummary.title: Partner with summary keys

UserDidItDataCustom.description:
A model that represents the "did it" actions recorded by a User
for a particular AggregatedPinData model.
UserDidItDataCustom.title: UserDidItData with custom keys

UserDidItDataDetailed.description:
A model that represents the "did it" actions recorded by a User
for a particular AggregatedPinData model.
UserDidItDataDetailed.title: UserDidItData with detailed keys

UserDidItDataSummary.description:
A model that represents the "did it" actions recorded by a User
for a particular AggregatedPinData model.
UserDidItDataSummary.title: UserDidItData with summary keys

UserWebsiteCustom.description:
A website claimable by a user.

    This is a read-only adapter for Domain and WebsitePath models, and it only
    contains fields common to both of them.
UserWebsiteCustom.title: UserWebsite with custom keys

UserWebsiteDetailed.description:
A website claimable by a user.

    This is a read-only adapter for Domain and WebsitePath models, and it only
    contains fields common to both of them.
UserWebsiteDetailed.title: UserWebsite with detailed keys

UserWebsiteSummary.description:
A website claimable by a user.

    This is a read-only adapter for Domain and WebsitePath models, and it only
    contains fields common to both of them.
UserWebsiteSummary.title: UserWebsite with summary keys

AggregatedPinDataCustom.description:
A model that represents aggregated data of Pins with the same link
and image signature.
AggregatedPinDataCustom.title: AggregatedPinData with custom keys

AggregatedPinDataDetailed.description:
A model that represents aggregated data of Pins with the same link
and image signature.
AggregatedPinDataDetailed.title: AggregatedPinData with detailed keys

AggregatedPinDataSummary.description:
A model that represents aggregated data of Pins with the same link
and image signature.
AggregatedPinDataSummary.title: AggregatedPinData with summary keys

scopes.manage_ads:
Manage your ad campaigns and see data including spend, budget,
and performance
scopes.manage_merchants: See and manage your Catalog (aka your shopping feed)
scopes.manage_organic:
See, update, and add to your public data (including boards,
Pins, comments, following, followers, and your profile)
scopes.read_ads:
See data on your ad campaigns, including spend, budget, and
performance
scopes.read_advertisers: See your advertising profile and settings
scopes.read_boards:
See all your boards (including secret boards and group boards
you join)
scopes.read_campaigns:
See data on your ad campaigns, including spend, budget,
and performance
scopes.read_domains:
Get your website's most clicked Pins, see the top Pins people
are saving and more
scopes.read_merchants: See your Catalog (aka your shopping feed)
scopes.read_organic:
See your public data (including boards, Pins, comments,
following, followers, and your profile)
scopes.read_pin_promotions: See your ads and ad creative
scopes.read_pins: See all your public Pins and comments
scopes.read_public: See all the public data on Pinterest
scopes.read_secret: See your secret boards and secret Pins
scopes.read_users:
See your public data (including boards, following, profile
etc.)
scopes.read_write: See and change any data on Pinterest
scopes.search_domain: Search for Pins from your website
scopes.search_global: Search all public Pins for you
scopes.write_ads: Create and manage your ad campaigns
scopes.write_advertisers: Create and manage your advertising profile
scopes.write_boards: Create new boards for you, and change your board settings
scopes.write_campaigns: Create and manage your ad campaigns
scopes.write_merchants: Manage your Catalog (aka your shopping feed)
scopes.write_organic:
Create new Pins and boards for you and update your public
data (including boards, Pins, following, followers, and your profile)
scopes.write_pin_promotions: Create and manage ads and ad creative
scopes.write_user_messages: Send messages on behalf of you
scopes.write_users: Change your following boards, Pins and users

/v3/users/me/viewer/.description:
Get an auth or unauth user's info

    Returns:
        A detailed user object

Pinterest-Version.description:
The X-Content-Type-Options response HTTP header is a marker
used by the server to indicate that the MIME types advertised in the
Content-Type headers should not be changed and be followed.

X-Content-Type-Options.description:
The X-Content-Type-Options response HTTP header is a marker
used by the server to indicate that the MIME types advertised in the
Content-Type headers should not be changed and be followed.

x-pinterest-sli-endpoint-name.description: Name of api handler that was called

x-pinterest-sli-response-type.description: response type to be used for service mesh

/v3/users/me/viewer/.summary:
Get an auth or unauth user's info

    Returns:
        A detailed user object
